Tesla is an unusual stock, known to most investors primarily as the leading electric vehicle (EV) company, but that isn't the primary value driver of the stock.

articles.headline: Finally, Some Good News for Tesla Investors
articles.summary: Per Elon Musk's X account, self-driving testing with no driver in the car is already happening. Joked Telemetry Insight auto analyst Sam Abuelsamid, Since Trump has no history of retaliating against perceived adversaries, hell probably just let this pass.  The dispute comes just a week before a planned test of Teslas driverless taxis in Austin, Texas, a major event for the company because sales of its EVs are lagging in many markets, and Musk needs a win.
